content.detailedDescription:
I have kept quiet about this for 47 years as i saw others ridiculed for reporting what they'd seen. now that i'm retired i could care less so here is my story. for the sake of brevity i will use the names jack and jim for my brothers.

my experience was in the fall of 1964 on a saturday night around 10:00 pm.  i lived three miles from the nearest town on a major highway 12 miles outside of erie, pennsylvania. my two younger twin brothers(13) and i (15) hitched a ride home from a skating rink and as we got out of the car that gave us a ride i noticed lights coming from the back of our property. this was about 300 yards from the highway and the lights were like a big glowing ball. nobody was home as my mother was working and all our weekly renters were out on the town. 

 we had a storage shed at the very back of our property and the field in front of the shed was lower and shielded from view by a long picket fence and roses bushes.

i unlocked the front door and we raced to the kitchen in the back of the house without turning on any lights. the kitchen was lite up from a light coming through the windows from large outside security lights. i got a flashlight out of a drawer as they looked out the window over the kitchen sink. i told them i was going to get my shotgun.

when i returned to the kitchen my brother jim was learning on the stove shaking with fear and mumbling. jack was looking out the window in obvious fear. as i loaded the gun with the light from the flashlight i placed on the counter, i told them it was probably somebody trying to steal things out of the shed and we would scare the daylights out of them.

jack kept saying those are awfully strange looking lights and they don't look like lights from a car. i had a quick look out the window but nothing but a glowing light and the top of some structure.

both of my brothers were acting very weird and totally out of character. i told them to follow me and i went out the back door. i quickly realized they weren't behind me and so i went back in the house. they were still frozen with fear. i looked at them and said: "what in the world is wrong with you two? why are the two of you acting like wimps?" 

jim yelled "i'm not going down there". he kept repeating this over and over like his brain was stuck as he still was leaning on the stove as fear obviously took out the use of his legs. i was completely dumb founded by his reaction to a glowing light. jack who was normally an arrogant loud mouth was dead quiet. i said come on jack let's go as he stood looking  blankly out the window. i said why are you guys wimping out on me like this? i have a gun and you know i never miss. jack slowly followed me out the door as i told him nothing would hurt him.

 we had five double motel units perpendicular from the highway beginning 75 feet from the back of the house and ending 125 yards at the edge of a field. the shed was another 300 feet from the front edge of the field. all lights were on as well as a dozen driveway lights and two pole lights. the area was lit up like a supermarket parking lot except where the craft landed. 

we sneaked along the back of the units and jack having regained his courage moved ahead of me by  ten yards. he looked around the corner of the last motel unit and quickly came running back to me. he started shaking all over from fear. i asked him what he saw as he walked by me heading for the house. he said "i don't know but i'm getting the hell out of here. i told him to wait and i then peered around the corner with my 16ga pump shotgun and holy shit i couldn't believe my eyes. there was a huge spacecraft and the outer diameter was only 30 to 40 yards away. i then ducked back around the corner and asked my brother what he thought and he said "i don't know but i'm getting the hell out of here". i told him to wait again and leaned the gun up against the back of the building as it was more apt to provoke an attack by these creatures. i peered around the corner again to have another look. i took a long hard look to get all the details but saw no alien creatures. i said do you think we could get closer for a better look. he looked at me like i'd lost my mind and said hell no and ran towards the house.

believe it or not but i didn't have any fear just a fascination at what i had just seen. my heart was beating out of my chest and i realized i might be brave but i wasn't about to be down their all alone and quickly caught up to jack.

the spacecraft was roughly a hundred and fifty feet in diameter with a band of dim blue-green and crimson colored lights around the perimeter. it was around twenty feet high and a dull silver metallic looking craft. it was a beautiful looking machine with no obvious seams or rivets of any kind. it was like three different saucers one on top of another but looked like the whole thing was stamped out of one piece of material. it was supported by four landing legs and the lights were about 1 1/2 feet high by a 3 feet long of alternating blue and red around the biggest diameter of the craft. the lights were pulsating counterclockwise and it gave you a strange feeling. the top had too rectangular black windows about five feet long and two and a half to three feet high.

we were all big for our age and afraid of nothing before this experience. i being older really wanted to get closer but again i wasn't about to go it alone. we got back to the house and jim hadn't moved from his leaning on the stove. he asked what we had seen and jack said you don't want to know. i explained in detail exactly what we had seen. he said that was enough for him and said i'm outta here. i stopped him in his tracks as he was heading for the front door and said he shouldn't go outside alone.

there was a bar about a city block away and i had just enough money for three cokes. we ran the 275 yards as fast as we could run and walked quickly through the front door. we walked through the bar area and continued into the dining area. we took a seat all out of breath. both jim an jack were white as ghosts. the 8-12 patrons at the bar looked at us and probably wondered what the heck was going on with these strange acting kids.

six people in the dining area were looking at us as we took our seats. the old woman that owned the place with her husband quickly came to our table and asked me if there was anything wrong. i just smiled and said no we were just running and out of breath. i thought she was going to kick us out because of our age but she let us stay. she looked at my brothers and then back at me and said are you sure you're all right with a questioning look. i assured her nothing was wrong and ordered three cokes and pretzels. jim was shaking and looking down at the floor and jack was looking straight ahead out the window. both looked a complete mess. 

we stayed there for three hours with this sweet old lady coming around every fifteen minutes with the same i know something's wrong look. we said nothing and agreed to keep our mouths shut as people would think we were crazy. we then went home and the craft was gone. we said nothing to our mother as she was having a difficult time with my father passing at 38 years old only two months ago and having to be the bread winner.

the next morning  jack and i checked out the site at daylight hoping to find some evidence. all we found were weeds flattened where the three foot diameter landing legs of the craft had been. jim refused to go any where near the site. the area was all gravel ground and it had been very dry and warm. you could have driven a semi-tractor trailer over this weed and 
grass field and it wouldn't have left a tire track. i was hoping for burn marks or something but none existed.

my two brothers and i discussed that night only a few times as it very much upset them. january of 1966 i tried discussing this again as we moved and were not anywhere close to the site and they still reacted the same. then around six months later they couldn't remember a thing and said i was crazy. both have no memory of this event today although it took months for them to get over it. jack remembers the morning after when we looked for evidence of the spacecraft landing site.

the really strange thing was the quickness of their negative reaction. we could be laughing and telling jokes and one word from me about that night and it was like i'd flipped a switch in their brains. they would only look at each other and then the fear would start. it was like they had their own pact between them. i believe that night was the first close contact for me but not for them. this experience had happened to them before, i'm sure of it now as why would they react to a glowing light with such fear. it's the only logical explanation as only two things could have taken place for them not to remember. one is they were abducted and their memory erased or fear made them forget it. if fear made them forget then why did it take so long. to my knowledge neither have told anybody anything to this day. this disturbs jack as well as he remembers looking for evidence of a spaceship landing but can't remember why he was doing it. jim has absolutely no memory but he was never quite the same person after that night.

after talking to jack for months of things before and after the actual event to try to jog his memory he finally remembers. he called me one night and told me the whole story including details that i had forgotten.

after that event many sightings in the area were reported and of course people laughed and questioned those people's sanity. this cemented our initial pact to be silent. people on the news were saying the sightings were probably weather balloons or lights from the city reflecting off clouds.

well we didn't live in a city and this sure wasn't a weather balloon. i didn't see no little green men but wouldn't have been surprised if one tapped me on the shoulder that night. i was a pretty fast runner back then but i'm sure the olympic record would have been shattered for the mile if that would have happened.
 
i wish i would have had a camera and taken a photo although it probably wouldn't have shown to much in the dark. it was  a very small area for this craft to land in as large 70 foot oak trees were across the back of the property and around the shed with am almost shear cliff to a creek 20 yards further. along one side was a grape vineyard and the other side had rows of three foot high black raspberry bushes. the craft itself took up at least half the field's depth and over a third of it's width. it was 250 yards from the back kitchen window of our house but only 86 yards from a neighbors house.

people today accept stories of sightings much better then they did back in 1964. i still get some strange looks when i tell this story by some people who think humans are the highest form of intelligence in the universe. they always say i'd walk right up to the craft and knock on the door. talk is cheap and until it actually happens to you it's just all speculation on how you would react. why i wasn't scared that night i have no idea. maybe it was my love of the old buck rogers tv program in the 1950's when i was a little kid. his spacecraft never looked anywhere near as good as this one.  

i do know that one experience is enough and i don't wish for this to happen again at least not this close. i got within 90-120 feet of this thing and that was way too close. thinking back i must have been crazy for wanting to get closer but even now sometimes i wished i would have as i don't think i'll get another chance. after reading about some close encounters with some bad results jack might just have saved me some pain or even my life. we can only surmise what might have happened.

if this ever happens to you i would suggest writing it down and have everybody sign it as i've read stories with similar results as my brothers losing their memory.

update:

i had only estimated the spacecraft's size and distances but decided yesterday to use google earth to view the landing location to see if i could scale the measurements. i had tried this before but couldn't get the scale right. my plan was to see if i could print a picture of an aerial view and then draw in the spacecraft. my family has not owned this property for 46 years and i have not lived in the area for 21 years.I did build a house 10 miles away and lived there for 18 years. i knew the dimensions of that property and used the dimensions to scale this property.

i was looking at the property where the landing took place and saw something very startling. i could see an outline of a circle in the field exactly where the craft had landed. a lot of things had changed on the property but the field looked untouched. the huge expanse of lawn that was in front of the field was now a grape vineyard but the exact landing site was still there. the farmer was obviously driving over the one side of the circle to tend to his vineyard but the rest of circle is still there.

i really don't know if this is just a case of other factors causing the existing circle but i find it interesting. the existing circle is 143 feet in diameter. i had originally from memory said the spacecraft was around 100 feet or over and had revised the estimate to 150 feet.

the link below shows the circle in the field. the other areas are grape vineyards or apple vineyards and that's why you see the lines running top to bottom. remember this was 47 years ago that this landing took place.

( link moved to fi box) cms 11/18/11 08:05 cst flg
content.summary: Ufo parked in the backyard

content.detailedDescription: Watched the chek six news in victoria and they had a couple that spotted something huge fly across the sky that was bright and big.  they said it wasn't a plane and it was to low to be a shooting star.  i tried to watch the report on the website but it has either been removed or the just aren't showing it.  might be worth a check.
content.summary: Watched the chek six news in victoria and they had a couple that spotted something huge fly across the sky that was bright and big.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went to a drive in. my wife turned around in her seat of my jeep and yelled " what is that!" i turned to my left and seen a disc with windows going all the way around the center of the craft,the inside of the craft was visible and i could see the power source. it was like a center section approx. 8 ft. tall and 4 ft. wide that was glowing orange and red, from that center section lighting bolts of power were coming out and dissipating round the windows in a counter-clockwise direction. the object floated over the ticket booth and headed down the entrance to the drive-in. its speed was about 2 mph. everyone at the movie saw the object and started to leave and some were driving underneath it. the object changed directions slightly and accelerated out towards another town. where we all observed the object seem to land.I was working for a co. with sensitive work and was told to "keep my mouth shut". otherwise i would lose my security clearance.Im tired of being quiet.
content.summary: My wife and i went to see a movie at a drive in when this object floated by and was observed by everyone in the drive in.

content.detailedDescription:
In downtown iowa city at approximately 9:45 p.M. on 11-16-2011, two witnesses noticed a triangle-shaped object flying slowly a few hundred feet in the air. they were having a conversation in a parking lot with little lighting when one of them noticed something moving in the air about 500 feet away from them. the area has highly regulated air traffic, as it is close to a hospital, so it ruled out their original idea that it was a military aircraft. it was also much too large to be remote controlled or a toy of some sort. the aircraft was silent and had no lights, so they could barely see it moving. it traveled south until it was completely out of sight.

about 15 minutes later, a very similar, or possibly the same aircraft came from the north, traveling south on the same path. it was traveling faster this time, but changed direction slightly before getting out of sight range.

the third sighting was 5-10 minutes later, in the exact same area and flight path, but the aircraft was shaped differently. the most accurate way to describe it was a peace sign, without the ring around it. the actual craft was dark, but it had white lines that extended on each branch and score marks that crossed those white lines. it wasn't like anything either of the witnesses had ever seen before. the aircraft was traveling slowly south-bound, then hovered above a building that was across the street for about 5-10 seconds. after that, it tilted and took off quickly going south in the same path that the previous aircrafts had gone. it quickly was out of sight because it also had no lights and was silent. the only reason the witnesses could see the white lines was because of the reflection from the few street lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three unidentified aircrafts were witnessed within 30 minutes. two were a triangle shape and the third was in a y-shape. they were completely silent with no lights.

content.detailedDescription:
This is second sighting of same object. last night it was further west and heading north. was not close enough to make out anything except general golden glow-thought maybe helicopter?.

tonite, at 10:10 pm, was outside taking break when i observed object approaching from the nw. it moved very slowly and this time i knew it would go directly overhead so i sat down on the sidewalk to watch.

it got close enough that i could see one blinking white light at the front and a row of 4 rectangular golden lights just behind the blinkig white light. the backwash of light was bright enough to see that the rectagular lights were on a solid surface. when it passed overhead, for an instant the lights were seen only as silouetted. then the rear came into view with an identical row of golden rectangular lights.

it proceeded at the same slow pace out of sight behind some buildings. during this whole thing, there were 2 commercial aircraft present, one passing very high from ene to wnw and another a few seconds later, passing from due south to north, also at high altitude. at no time were plane engines audible.

i finished my smoke and sat there thinking, what the crap did i just see? i'm ex-military, spent a couple of years of that time stationed at an air force base. in no way do i believe i have seen every type of aircraft we have, but this in no way resembled any aircraft i've ever seen.
content.summary: Object passed overhead from nw to se, second sighting of same object

content.detailedDescription:
Was taking cloud pictures with wife and took three in a 10 second period.
first one shows nothing, then object appears in second shot, and then moves slightly lower in third. didn't see anything until i looked at the shots right after, because of distance i didn't see anything until looking at the
pictures.  after tried to see if i could recreate shot, but no luck.  we 
both thought that the object was solid, and not a flare, and the fact that it appeared in the 10 seconds i took the shots from one pic to the next is
something we cant explain.  no vapor trail or anything...It just appeared. i have never experienced anything like this...Hopefully someone can tell me what this is.
content.summary: Nothing in first picture, then appears and moves in next 2  (10 seconds)

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a client meeting with one of my staff members and noticed a very bright light in the sky. i watched it for a couple of minutes and the person with me saw me looking at it. as is got nearer we noticed it didn't move like a plane or look like a plane. it kind of floated down and hovered above the trees and we could easily see it's triangular shape. it was silver in color with a bright white light in front, a red light in the center and several green lights going around the outer edges of the craft forming a triangle. we were stunned! soon we saw several other craft flying from several different directions and not flying like planes do. they were higher up in the sky flying over the highway and we could not see under them but they had extremely large, bright lights in the front. they would appear in one part of the sky and disappear and be somewhere completely different!

as we drove into golden valley there was another low flying triangle exactly like the one we saw hovering over the trees in st. louis park. we could easily see the triangle shape because of all the lights on it's under belly. we were freaking out and feeling dazed by the whole thing wondering what it could be. i had to get back to my house to go to another client meeting otherwise we would have gotten out and tried to capture a video of the craft. i still can't believe what we saw! wondering if it's some kind of military craft monitoring the occupy mn protests. have no idea...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw several metalic flying triangles over a major highway and two, low hovering triangles with green lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my balcony having a cigarette. my balcony faces south west and overlooks lake ontario and humber bay. it was 530 so the sun was setting when i noticed a bright star like orb just over the water. it hovered and moved very slowly in a north ward direction over mississauga oakville area. the object continued moving north until i could no longer see it from surrounding apartment buildings. where the object was flying is in major flightpaths for 2 surrounding airports, pearson international airport (yyz) and billy bishop toronto island airport. multiple aircraft flew by the object at various altitudes. this has happened every evening for the last 3 nights now (november 15, 16, 17) at the same time in the same direction, speed, and altitude.
content.summary: Star like orb over toronto ontario november 15th 16th and 17th!

content.detailedDescription: Driving from natchitoches ,la. to home new orleans,la.On i-49.Spouse said what kind of airplane is that? trying to use all of my aviation and aerospace experiance to make a aircraft out of the craft ,trails,rotors,propellers,wings,empanase,sound,but the aerodynamcs was wrong and was anti gravity and using inisable cloaking or time portal.The craft were silver equalateral traingles,was first one ,then 2 more appeared,then three more appeared for a total of six in a flight formation.Hoovering at a steady speed moving north then northeast slowly.Then one of the craft in the slight right north by northeast reflected the morning sun light like polished alunium or mirror into my eyes and blinded me momentarily.After the slight turn to the north north east i figured good i will get to see the craft from the backside but then they vanished.Personal theroy invisable cloaking or time portal or warp.1st trying to make sense of what i know about aircraft,two not possible with our technology,three wanted to get video camera of of trunk of car to video but thought by the time i would stop the car it and they would be gone.I was courious about the crafts envioment who was pilots,what propultion?,what was it made of ,then scared,realized we were seeing something extra ordinary,never thought i / we would ever see anything out of this world.I and spouse never talked about it until 10 years later ,now i want anyone who will listen take note this was real as it gets.The objects disappeared into thin air.Vanished.
content.summary: 6 craft appear hover flt path with direction change,reflect sun light like mirror,disappear like time portal or cloaking device

content.detailedDescription:
Excited to be in ocean city, i was outside on a deck on the first floor of a three floor condo building having a smoke, looking at the stars and watching the people across the street party on their 3rd floor deck.
i was looking at the orion constellation and saw a falling star start from the left of orion���s belt and continued through bottom part of the constellation.  the falling star was incredibly bright and it seemed like it took forever for it finally burn out. 
the people across the street left and went to the beach, so i  went inside and got another smoke before i went to bed.  i���m guessing it was about 15 minutes since i saw the falling star.
i went back outside sat down and noticed a figure sitting at the patio table on the 2nd floor of the condo building across the street.  i found it to be very strange because no one was occupying that unit.  i was staring in disbelief at how this figured looked.  it was sitting at the table like a human would, with its left arm resting on the table and it appeared his legs were crossed (for some reason, i feel as though it was male).  the figure was tall, big, muscular with a shadow/black like appearance and no visible features.  the head was elongated and it was very large.  i couldn���t believe i sat there because of what i seeing  i should have screamed and ran inside but didn���t. i could tell it knew i was there, but i eventually got up and left because it made no movement and i grew scared of what would happen.  as i closed the sliding glass door after going inside, the figure was still there.
that morning during the light, i tried to determine what could have made that figure on the deck and there was nothing on the deck but a table and 4 chairs.
i will never forget what i saw and will believe until the day i die, that something visited ocean city in the wee hours of the morning that day.
content.summary: May 29, 2010 around 3:00am, ocean city maryland, 100 feet from the beach

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i (both air force vets) heard a jet plane passing over going from south to north. it was partly cloudy. we did not see the jet but saw 15 to 25 free falling (no power), dull aluminum collored disk 
shaped ufos. after getting below the clouds they formed a v formation.They moved to the south and turned to the east. they flickered like they did not have full control. they accelleratd to a high rate of speed toward a dark rain cloud which was over our mobil oil refinery. several times one of them would shoot streight up or down 100 plus feet and the return to it's place in the 400+ m/hr v formation. we lost sight as they went to the dark cloud. they avoided the jet fighter. they were noisless.
   we saw a newspaper report that ufos had been seen in 5 different countries the same week. we made no report because we knew that the blue book crew would be no help.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 15to 25 discs droped, formed v formation. avoided jet plane. sped to dark rain cloud.

content.detailedDescription: 3 ufo's hovering over ashland, oregon
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 ufo's hovering over ashland, oregon

content.detailedDescription: Response to case 33373 again and the other wisconsin "string of lights" in the sky reports.  heres video from the second day of sightings
content.summary: Wisconsin lights-day 2

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on i-94 at approx 6;15-6:30pm cst around the portage/baraboo area when i noticed 3 extremely bright orange lights in the north/northwest sky roughtly 30 degrees above the horizon. at first they looked like planes in a line on approach for landing or possibly in a triangle shape they were quite a ways away(i would guess 10-20 miles out on the horizon) so it was hard to tell. then they all appeared to drop rapidly then stopped and then they just disappeared.

a couple of minutes later a line of bright orange lights appeared again just to the northwest of where i saw the previous lights they looked like a long wing with a large bright orange light at each end and in one the middle with 2-4 smaller orange lights in between the end and middle on each side. it moved soemwhat then dropped rapidly like the lights before and then just disappeared - all at once, there was no slow fading or one at a time  -it was like they were all turned off.

i have lived around an airport all of my life and am very familiar with nav lights etc, these were not like anything i have ever seen before. they were a bright orange steady burning - no pulsating or flashing. and definitely not typical plane lights - there was a plane that appearded to be flying above them traveling to the north wthat was not effected or did not appear to close to them. 

i was freaked out a little - it reminded me right away of some of the ufo type videos i have seen. i called my finance right after and described the whole ordeal to her.
content.summary: I saw 3 very bright steady orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I just saw strange glowing pulsated lights in space when i was looking at the stars, they were changing direction fast, from left to right and up and down, i call my wife and everyone in my moms house to look at the lights or orbs in space and the lights were flying fast up and down then stop and moved from left to right in fast speeds, my parents that are christians and non believer in life in space they just say they are nasa satellites or the hubble space telescope, but i know nasa satellites can move in that speeds and change directions sow quick in high speeds... they strange orbs were doing that for 5 minutes or more and in a flash left to space and everyone was amazed in what happened the lights or orbs just despairing in a flash, and second later a army helicopter was looking with a spot lights at us and everyone in the neighborhood then they left to the mountains to look around then left after 10 minutes later.
content.summary: Saw strange glowing pulsated lights in space

content.detailedDescription: My parents took me to the fair at banbury, it was an annual event around the end of october, i was 5 or 6. i was in the back seat of my dad's car, retuning home and as kids do, i was bored so, i tipped my head back to look up out the rear window. and there several hundred feet up was the iron chicken's nest. so i told my mother who informed me i hadn't seen it as it couldn't exist, because it was only on a tv show (69-70 uk release series 1). i didn't see it depart because i had to sensibley sit back down in my seat incase of a car crash. it wasn't rain drops on the glass as it was a clear dry night, it wasn't a star. the object was a big as a fingernail when your arm is outstretched. thats all really, i've no history of mental illness and went on to serve 22 years in the uk armed forces, i saw plenty of aeroplanes and helicopters in my time, and i'm at a loss to what it was, i can only think it was a big space station, but they wern't up there were they then, and it do look like a jumble of silver scrap metal. no one else saw it and i don't recollect the local paper, the banbury cake reporting it in the next few days, i never had any visits from officals and neither did i get abducted.
content.summary: The iron chicken's nest from the clangers tv series

content.detailedDescription: While driving on my work route one morning around 9am i noticed a bright light in the sky coming toward me. i first assumed it was a morning traffic helicopter but when it got closer i noticed it didn't make a sound.  i pulled off the road and got out of my car and tried to determine what i was looking at. i could see a comercial airplane in the distance leaving from metro airport which was about 12 miles south of where i was standing looking at this object when i realized it didn't have a trajectory and it seemed to be reflecting sun light rather than emitting a search light. the object seemed to be a glass diamond being dangeled from a string reflecting the suns light as it wobbled slowly in what became about a mile arc. it went north of me about a mile and then west about a mile of me and then south toward the airport, like a long slow wobbly u-turn not seeming to gain altitude the whole time. by the time it turned south toward the airport i was loosing time on my work route and got back on the road sure i would see something on the evening news about it. that didn't happen and since then i've payed attention to news choppers in the sky which don't have the same outline and don't keep a reflective glow like this object.  i've never seen weather ballons that just wobble and never gain height and then make a u-turn either.
content.summary: Bright object came toward me in sky while driving on a sunny morning. first assumed it was a traffic helicopter but realized it wasn't.

content.detailedDescription: We went to bed and were reading. we heard a strange humming sound. i asked my husband [a vietnam veteran] if it was a helicopter. he said"none that i have ever heard" then a bright light lit up the room. i looked out the window and the yard was very bright. i then got up and looked out the other windows and realized that the yard all around the house was lit up brightly. i went to the front door and looked out,i looked up and it seemed the whole sky was pitch black, as if something were blocking it. i went back upstairs and looked out the window again,then the light went out abruptly,the noise stopped and it was as if it had never been there. i called the ffa the next day and asked if they had drug planes or any planes in the area. he said no,then said "could it have been a ufo". i said "pardon me" and he said "oh never mind." then he hung up!
content.summary: Lying in bed reading,bright light lit up room and around my house.Slight low pitched sound. 20 mins or so later,light abruptly went  out and noise stopped,no sign of anything

content.detailedDescription: Went outside this last may around dusk and looked over to the west in the lower sky was a white light low in the sky. as i was watching it, it seemed to change shape and turn a red & orange color as it was slowly going down tell i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Observed white light in lower sky at dusk for about an hour slowly going down then turn red & orange tell it droped down out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Mid july 1998,11;30 at night.My wife and i on patio in back yard 
it came out of the eastern sky.At first i thought it was a meteor,as it got closer,i could tell it was no meteor.It stopped about a mile or so away in the eastern sky.Asked my wife,look at this,she didn,t look up.I could tell the shape of it,like a disc.The body of it was glowing,red,yellow,and orange.It wasn,t real bright but it had a halo around it.Asked my wife again to look up,she didn,t.Then it moved in a southerly direction for about a half a mile and stopped again.Asked her again,she didn,t look up.Then all of a sudden,it started to go easterly again at a rapid speed back into space.The halos were getting smaller as it left.Like it was a tunnel,and you could see the object getting smaller inside the halos.I reported this event two years later to the usuforic,which was in eastern tennessee.The head of the organization put the report in a journal on the web all over the world.This event still bothers me after all these years.And the usuforic has shut down abruptly a couple of years after this report.It still bothers me,i wish i never seen it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing disc shape with a halo

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a dark grey triangle about one hundred feet across with different colored lights follow the 1/2 mile airstrip 900 feet from my house.The craft had no sound and moved in a very straight line until it got to the pond where it turned and continued out of sight at 4 pm nov.1st.A red flashing light towards the middle bottom was flashing and around the craft were different colors that did not flash.The cat did a belly crawl inside the house for at least 10 minutes after the sighting.Also an orange  ball the size of a beach ball followed the craft,about 500 feet behind in a straight line with the craft.The reason i saw the craft was the cat jumped up on the bay window sill and acted very differently which made me look in the direction of the cat.This is when i noticed movement coming from the north side of the airstrip.You could not miss the sighting once you looked out of my office window over the deck.When i first saw the triangle figure and the different colored lights around the craft and the way it moved just above the treetops there was no question at what i was looking at.There is nothing in our inventory of flying machines that would float at such a crawl and emit no sound at all.When the craft made a slow turn over the pond i lost sight of the craft because of the 50ft or so over the ground.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I own a half mile airstrip with a pond next to it.This craft at about 5 mph at around treetop level followed the airstrip from north to south.

content.detailedDescription: Large pulsating ball, orange and yellow
content.summary: Standing outside and looked down the street and saw this large glow and it went down.

content.detailedDescription: Listening to scanner. overheard southwest airline pilot descibe 2 different colored lights iluminating the cockpit. described it as a green light and a white light alternating back and forth. wasn't comming from the ground (negative on a hand held laser)pilot could not identify the origin of the lights. pilot used a word at the time to describe situation to the tower. can't remember what is was but i looked it up the next day and it meant strange situation for an airline to be in. something to that effect. reported incident to our local mufon dr. with no response. can't remember his altitude but he said it appeared to be coming from the sky
content.summary: Lstening to scanner, overheard a south west pilot describing green and white lights in cockpit. not from the ground

content.detailedDescription:
Happen to look out kitchen window with faces east by southeast. i was looking do east, first i saw a passenger jet coming in for a landing at lax. 
 then directly east of me i saw this cirular objects with many lights going around and around. i watched until it just disappeared.
content.summary: Circular object with multitude of lights. saw outside distance from kitchen window

content.detailedDescription: I have video of it no fake 100% real must see but its for sale im a ufo hunter i spent a lot of time getting this viedq
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was round shape white lights  a red light on top

content.detailedDescription:
i was mowing our lawn on september 21,2011 east of our house near the deck on which boot or foot prints are still visible (see my reportof may 21, 2011).  i noticed a trail of burned imprints in our lawn from our garage area westtoward the house. the trail of prints did not step on the back sidewalk but continued in a circle back to where they entered the lawn area.
     i took pictures and of course have pictures of the trail and the imprints but i do not know how to put those pics on line for you.
     the prints have faded with the mowing of the grass but some can still be seen as burned grass. we are not sure but now that the grass has slowed its growth there appears to be a circular area of burned grass in this same area.  we will wait to see what happens when we get more rain and if it is still there.
     at any rate we think the prints in the grass were our third visit or sighting in the last two years or 24 months.  as i said before, we do not have dogs and our property does not have any lights on at night.  we live in a very peaceful and quiet area in the middle of many almond orchards.  i might also note, i have no fear of aliens.  we took a trip to the southwest stopping at roswell, new mexico to visit the ufo museum a couple weeks ago.  the personnel there gave us the information of how to contact you and saw our pictures.  they have asked to have everything sent to them for their research and library.  i will do that soon.
content.summary: A trail of imprints burned into our lawn near our house and almost under the deck where foot for boot prints were and are still  found on our upstairs deck

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were travelling west on i-80 about 5 miles east of geneseo, il. it was august 12, 2011, 10:18 pm when this started. she was driving. i'd travelled this stretch of interstate at night twice a week for the past year while traveling to a job site so i feel i have a good sense of what i should and shouldn't see by now.  i was looking out the passenger window when some lights caught my attention.
it was night and we were traveling west at about 73 miles per hour, so my estimation of distances and motion of the object might not be entirely accurate given our speed and direction. the object was to my northwest. it appeared to maybe 1/4 mile (or a little more) north of i-80. i would guess it to have been 200-300 feet in the air. however, like i said, it was night and we were moving so my estimates might be off.
at first i just assumed them to be the lights of a small aircraft. one was red and one was white. nothing i hadn't seen before. there were only two and they were right on top of each other. not blinking or anything. just steady lights. a little odd light placement for an aircraft, but i still wasn't thinking anything abnormal at this point. 
then the top light slowly went out. about two or three seconds later a light horizontal to the remaining light came on slowly. i thought maybe it was a cell tower or something i'd never noticed there before. however, after years of driving around illinois for my job, i feel i have a good handle on light patterns of different types of towers.
when i say the lights slowly went out and came back on, remember how those older radio antennae tower would have those slow pulsating lights? the rate of illumination and decay of these lights was much much slower than those types of lights. the lights were also a little brighter and slightly larger than lights one would usually see on smaller aircraft.
now i'm looking at two lights that are still horizontal to each other. then the original light (the one on the left) goes out slowly. a few seconds later another light appears above the one that is still it. then the original light that was on the top-left comes on again, but this time a different color.
for the next few minutes these lights would come on and off. any combination of lights would occur. at any moment there would be 1, 2, or 3 lights on, but never all 4. all of the lights would alternate between white and red. however, they would never change color when illuminated. if one came one red or white it would remain that color until going off. there was no apparent pattern as to which lights would come on when or how long a light would stay on.
if i had to guess, i would say that the lights were the part of the same structure or aircraft. although, i never could seen an outline of any type of craft. 
from my vantage point, the lights appeared about centimeter apart vertically, maybe an inch horizontally. however, in seeing that i can't give a direct distance of the object relative to myself, i don't know how far away the lights actually may have been from each other. if i had to guess, i would say maybe 10 to 15 feet.
during the entire event, which lasted about 3 to 4 minutes, the lights maintained the shape of a perfect rectangle with the long side running horizontal. this shape never seemed to falter until the object was a good distance behind us. if it were a cell tower or something, i would think the apparent position of the lights in respect to each other would have changed relative to our passing it.
if i were to guess, i would put the object moving westbound very slowly as we did not pass it as fast as other things. it seemed to stay to the northwest of us and north of us longer than a stationary object would have. however, once we passed it, the distance between us and the object seemed to grow more quickly which leads me to believe it then started traveling northeast. however, i never saw it turn. by the time this occurred, with the distance between us my eyesight couldn't make out individual positions of the lights. to my eye, it was just one blurry light changing colors. but that was more because i wasn't wearing my reading glasses.
when the object seemed to change and start traveling northeast, the interstate did veer slightly to the right, which would have given the illusion of the object veering that direction anyway. however, the position of the object seemed to over-compensate northeastward in comparison to the illusion of motion a stationary object would have given.
i watched the object until (still appearing to be heading northeast even though the interstate was a now a northwesterly straight section again) it was only a few degrees over the horizon. then we began passing the town of geneseo and i lost sight of it.
during the event my wife glanced over at it as much as should could. however, we were driving with our twin babies in the back so not crashing won out over her watching it. we decided not to pull over (again out of fear of getting hit while parked and hurting the kids).
three days later as we passing geneseo heading east back to chicago, i looked diligently in the same area and saw nothing. this leads me to believe it wasn't a tower of some sort. i have also driven past that site many times before, but never have seen anything in that location since.
there is the gen-park which is a grass airstrip about a mile and a half north of where we were driving that night. however, that strip would most likely only be able to hand single engine planes. this did not appear to be a single engine plane at all. also, a plane would have had to bank a turn to make a change in direction. this object did not appear to do so.
i would love to be able to look at faa records of the area from that time on that night to see if there was any registered aircraft in that location at that time. please let me know how i might be able to go about researching this or see if anyone else witnessed this object. thanks!
content.summary: Lights very slowly alternating in sky unlike any convential aircraft i've seen

content.detailedDescription:
Walked past my kitchen window and a light caught my eye. i saw it was bright and flashing so i ran upstairs to my attic room window to get a better look.
it was over toward the north/east horizon over toward rotherham from sheffield.
it was flashing bright white, blue and redish coulord and was stationary for about 5 mins and suddenly dimed down to a very faint light in the sky and began to move west. i only just manage to keep my eye on it due to it being so faint at this point but the changed back its direction over towards its original position, got a little brighter and then dissaperd over the horizon. 
ive never seen anything like this before and it was definatly not an airoplpane or a chineese lantern
content.summary: Bright flashing blue/white/red light

content.detailedDescription:
we live on our 80 acre almond ranch which is surrounded by more almond orchards not belonging to us.  it is a very peaceful place nine miles from the closest incorporated town and in a county with only 29,000 inhabitants and farming as its major industry.  we do not have any dogs and there is no outdoor light on at night.
     on the weekend of may 21-22, 2011, we watched our grandson receive his master's degree and then helped him celebrate his engagement with all the family in the sacramento, california area one hundred miles from our ranch.  we were not home the night of may 21, 2011.
     monday, may 23, 2011 found me shaking out our bedspread from our upstairs deck after the weekly change of linens.  our three upstairs bedrooms have sliding glass doors that open onto the deck.As i turned my head to look south, i noticed what i thought was a layer of dust kind of floating and after affects of activity on the decking about 30 feet away so i began walking toward the "dust" and immediately noticed under by feet some sort of black foot or boot prints about 4 inches long and 3 inches wide with three black lines across them on the charcoal decking and then realized there were many more prints all over the entire deck but they did not go over to our bedroom doors.  the prints stayed fairly close to the deck metal railing about twenty feet off of the ground.  the prints are still there in one area where it appeared "they" first stepped on to the deck.  i took and have pictures of them.
     i invited very few friends and relatives to look at the prints over several weeks which did not seem to be going away even though we had several inches of rain.  no one could define what they were but i always felt they were those of an alien or aliens.
     i decided to call our county sheriff in july.  he was very excited when he heard my story.  he came out with his camera and took many pictures and agreed with me that the prints on our upstairs deck had to be that of aliens.  he then proceeded to tell me of many sightings in our county over the years. he said "they" appear to be very interested in water and electricity.  i told him about my first sighting on our ranch in 2009 at our irrigation well.  i also told him of the twenty-four solar panels we had installed in november of 2010 to make electricity for our home, shop and well.  he was very interested and thought that could be the reason for the second visit.  our sheriff is very interested in ufos but did not know who to contact about the foot or boot prints.
content.summary: Gone for weekend.  found 4 inch black foot or boot imprints on our upstairs deck.  prints still there and i have photos.

content.detailedDescription:
i was returning home from a meeting sometime after 9:00 p.M. on september 13, 2009.It was a very dark night - no moon- and as i was driving down the quarter of a mile gravelled driveway on our almond ranch where we live at the above address, i noticed a light in our almond orchard.  i immediately became upset because the almonds had just been shook off the 6,000 trees and were lying on the ground.  whoever was out in our orchard was driving over the nuts and ruining them.  i stopped the car and  listened.  there was no noise.
     the light was very bright and about 40 almond rows south of me heading east and toward the power line which brings electricity to our irrigation pump.  when it got near the power lines, it turned north in my direction and i saw a big light that was larger than an automobile or tractor's headlight.  it kept coming towards me and then turned west toward our irrigation pump about 24 almond rows from me and stopped.  it appeared to be hovering at our irrigation pump as i saw red and white lights making out an oval shape.  there was no sound.
     i turned around in our circular drive to go back west down our driveway and with that they saw me and they were gone!  as i approached road s at the end of our driveway, i saw a tan colored sedan going north on road s very slowly.  my impulse was to overtake the car to talk to the driver to see what he saw what i saw but decided against it.
     i drove back to our home and immediately asked my husband when i got in the door if he had heard any noises such as a helicopter would make and he said he had not.  i also called our nearest neighbor who is located on glenn county road 25 south of our almond orchard and he had not heard anything.
     we have been living on these 80 acres which we own since 1957.  we first had a dairy and flood irrigated pastures and hay fields.  after 32 years, we planted almonds.  we flood irrigated them using the same pump and well that still exists until 2005 when we changed from flood irrigation to micro-sprinkler irrigation which changed a few things in the process of getting the water to the trees at the pump sight. were they interested in that?
     i definitely feel i saw a ufo on our ranch near our pump.  the pump is approximately 300 feet from our house and driveway.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Big white light in almond orchard, nuts on ground and then oval shaped object with red and white lights hovered at our irrigation pump after driving through our orchard
